caption:
I’m all in on making real estate listings more transparent. Every buyer should be able to see every home for sale—no hidden inventory, no insider access required. 

When listings are open, buyers win with better choices, sellers win with fair competition, and prices stay honest. This move pushes the industry forward and opens the door wider for more people to become homeowners. I’m watching to see which brokerage steps up next. 

Sellers deserve the full truth—not advice that keeping a home off-market will get them more money, when the data says otherwise. Transparency isn’t about forcing anyone’s hand. It’s about making sure buyers and sellers have real choices and fewer regrets.

#exp #zillow #compassrealestate #transparency
